8_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: I saw one proxy using port 80 instead of 43110. Can this be done in ZeroNet?

> [nofish](#comment_758_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Sure, start it with --ui_port 80

Thanks a lot. :-)

> [nofish](#comment_758_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Sure, start it with --ui_port 80

Will it work if "ui_port = 80" is added to zeronet.conf instead of starting ZeroNet with python zeronet.py --ui_port 80?
